definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: The Huang family went to the countryside for vacation.
sentences.chinese: 黃家一家人去鄉下渡假。

sentences.english: The rest of us wore rough tweeds and brogues.
sentences.chinese: 粗花呢衣服和鄉下人穿的結實皮鞋。

sentences.english: In the country, he can hear the birds singing and sheep bleating .
sentences.chinese: 在鄉下，他能聽到鳥兒歌唱和羊的叫聲。

sentences.english: When we lived in the countryside, we had to send away for many things we needed.
sentences.chinese: 我們住在鄉下時，許多東西都得匯錢到外地函購。

sentences.english: I'm driving collectively a country roadvertising oned I'm completely lost.
sentences.chinese: 我開車順着一條鄉下小路前行，我一經全體迷路了。

sentences.english: She spent her girlhood in the country.
sentences.chinese: 她少女時期是在鄉下度過。

sentences.english: A hillbilly was visiting the big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一個鄉下人第一次到大城市遊逛。

sentences.english: Hank is a small-town country boy.
sentences.chinese: 漢克是個淳樸的鄉下少年。

sentences.english: It is far away in the country, but always with me,wherever I am.
sentences.chinese: 它雖遠在鄉下，但不論我身在何方，它都會伴隨着我。

sentences.english: We stayed in my uncle’s every time we went to the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 我們每次到鄉下玩都是住在舅舅家。

sentences.english: In fact, he grew up dirt-poor in rural Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，他在貧窮的田納西鄉下長大。

sentences.english: He said that a countrywoman had brought it and asked him to give it to me.
sentences.chinese: 他說是一個鄉下婦女送來，託他轉給我的。

sentences.english: I guess I'm just a country cousin.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我真是個鄉下佬。

sentences.english: When I was in the  countryside, I often walked by the  riverside.
sentences.chinese: 我在鄉下時經常在河邊散步。

sentences.english: I am only a poor peasant bishop.
sentences.chinese: 而我呢，只是一個乾癟癟的鄉下主教。

sentences.english: They 've just purchased a new house in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他們剛地鄉下買了棟新房。

definition: to go to school/to attend school
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
